portfolio.title: The CodeX
portfolio.description: A full-stack educational platform that allows users to access online courses, quizzes, and tutorials. The project was designed to enhance learning experiences for students by providing structured learning content.

portfolio.title: YAATRA
portfolio.description: A platform mimicking Airbnb's features, allowing users to browse listings, book properties, and host their own listings. This project focused on creating a user-friendly, scalable platform with real-time booking functionalities.
